title: Blended Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented language education course for professionals, operated in a BYOD environment with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners acquire intermediate-level language communication skills required in professional work environments.
Learners adapt to blended learning environments by applying self-directed learning strategies on online platforms.
Learners can complete practical language projects collaboratively with team members using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
